title: This weeks skin sales
body: I just saw that the next skin sale started and apparently they still cost normal prices, despite being advertised as 50% off. Why must I get battle bunny riven for 975 instead of the discount 487? Rito plz

replies.body:
Hey ThePyroGod, sorry for the confusion; I know you're excited to battle on with Battle Bunny Riven, but hold on for a little longer. The sale should start tomorrow (Oct 20) according to the announcement here:

- http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-1020-1023

It looks like the store in the game client is incorrectly showing both the sale ending today and the sale starting tomorrow. Just hang in there until tomorrow when the sale kicks in; in the meantime, I've contacted my colleagues about the visual bug.

> [{quoted}](name=Son Golin,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=peo9toEz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-20T02:43:04.740+0000)
>
> It looks like the store in the game client is incorrectly showing both the sale ending today and the sale starting tomorrow. Just hang in there until tomorrow when the sale kicks in; in the meantime, I've contacted my colleagues about the visual bug.

I have a related question about Yorick.  Yorick's on sale tomorrow as well, but I thought he was on that "no promotion until rework" list (which is why he's not on the free week promotion, why Riot never bothered to make a skin in over four years and four months, and why some Riot employees poop all over Yorick players at every opportunity.)
Sales are announced Monday and Thursday, but start on Tuesday/Friday.
